from exploitation of user privacy, who do you think will win in the long run? http://wn.com/After_Hours_Earnings_Google_Big_Drop_in_Equity_Price_Options_Trading_Strategy_Pt_1 www.StockMarketFunding.com Pt 1$ 16 Drop " Google Inc. had a strong second quarter," said Eric Schmidt , CEO of Google Inc. . Solid growth in our core business and very strong growth in our emerging businesses drove 24% revenue growth year over year. We saw strength in every major product area, as more and more traditional brand advertisers embraced search advertising and as large advertisers increasingly ran integrated campaigns across search, display, and mobile. We feel confident about our future, and plan to continue to invest aggressively in our core areas of strategic focus. Q2 Financial Summary Google Inc. reported revenues of$ 6.82 billion for the quarter ended June 30, 2010, an increase of 24% compared to the second quarter of 2009.
